document_data.name: Rilrae Zolond
document_data.mainbody: '''Rilrae Zolond''' was member of [[House Zolond]] and a novice priestess of [[Arach-Tinilith]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1372 DR, Rilrae was a novice priestess at Arach-Tinilith. She was possessed by one of the [[demon]]s sent by [[Gromph Baenre]] to kill his sister Mistress [[Quenthel Baenre]], profiting off the [[Silence of Lolth]]. However, Quenthel noticed Rilrae's the strange behavior in time and immediately killed her, thwarting the assassination attempt.
